title: Hooligan
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I got poison in my feet
One more hit to knock you down
All my love is out of reach
Taste my lips, I'll watch you drown
[Pre-Chorus]
'Round, and 'round, and 'round we go
Do you like the pain I bring?
Tightest grip around your soul
And you will fight it (And you will fight it)
I'm no saint, I've never been
I will never let you win
I will always make you cry
[Chorus]
'Cause I'm a hooligan, hooligan
Sail away, don't be a fool again, fool again
Try to heal, but I'm not born again, born again
Can only love you like a hooligan, hooligan
[Verse 2]
You keep comin' back to hurt
Call it stupid, call it dumb
'Cause everytime it never works
'Cause all this trouble made you numb

[Pre-Chorus]
'Round, and 'round, and 'round we go
You keep comin' back for more
Tightest grip around your soul
And you don't mind it
I'm no saint, I've never been
I will never let you win
I will always make you cry
[Chorus]
'Cause I'm a hooligan, hooligan
Sail away, don't be a fool again, fool again
Try to heal, but I'm not born again, born again
Can only love you like a hooligan, hooligan
[Bridge]
Ooh, ooh, I'm an angel off to sin
Ooh, ooh, there's no remedy within
Ooh, ooh, can only love you like a hooligan, hooligan
I never meant to make you cry
Make you cry, make you cry
It's just the way I'm made inside, inside
No matter what I do
I'm just a hooligan, hooligan
[Chorus]
'Cause I'm a hooligan, hooligan
Sail away, don't be a fool again, fool again
Try to heal, but I'm not born again, born again
Can only love you like a hooligan, hooligan

[Outro]
Ooh, ooh, I'm an angel off to sin
Ooh, ooh, there's no remedy within
Ooh, ooh, can only love you like a hooligan, hooligan
I'm just a hooligan, hooligan
